EmailTemplate.name: BK_Videos_OptIn_MC.BK_Confirmation_Videos_OptIn_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome! - Subscription Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
YOU'RE CONNECTED
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully subscribed to BendixKing e-communications.*
That means you’ll be able to get exclusive updates about our offerings, news and events and special offers.
Can’t wait? Check our website here <[[https://bendixking.com/]]>.
Thank you!
BendixKing
*E-communications refers to email, social media and digital advertising. You can unsubscribe from our email communications at any time. To unsubscribe, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
